mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_reply(rno, bno, replyer, replyText) VALUES(seq_reply.NEXTVAL, #{bno}, #{replyer}, #{replyText})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_reply SET replyText = #{replyText}, updateDay = SYSDATE WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, replyer, replyText, regDay, updateDay FROM t_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY rno ASC
